references.citationDetail: TEMPLE OF GENIUS AUGUSTI (TEMPLE OF VESPASIAN)
references.formattedCitation: Osanna, Massimo, ed. Pompeii Sites: Portale Ufficiale Parco Archeologico di Pompei. Accessed January 10, 2020. http://pompeiisites.org/.

description: The "Temple of Vespasian" (VII, 9, 2), also referred to as Aedes Genii Augusti, is situated between the Temple of the Lares Publici and the Building of Eumachia on the eastern side of the forum of Pompeii. Its precise attribution is still a matter of debate.
